container.value: Room 503, 5th Floor, HuiLongGuan ShouKaiGuangChang, Changping District, Beijing

creator: HappyBees&Screen Voice Recorder&Video Music Editor
descriptionHtml:
Super Recorder is a powerful voice recorder & audio transcription app, you can record high-quality sound without time limit, and there are no ads in this app!

You can record meetings, interviews, speeches, music, courses, sleep talks, etc., or record the sound of online videos & music, easy and fast!

Suitable for students
· Even if the sound source is far away, you can record clear lessons and speeches to help you prepare for each exam.
· There is no recording time limit, and you can choose the MP3 format to save your space to record long courses.

Suitable for business people
· Start recording quickly.
· Convert the content of the meeting into text and share it with your colleagues.

Suitable for musicians
· Record high-quality audio files, support wav lossless format, record and rehearse and reproduce your music.

Suitable for everyone
· Record everything you want to record, and don't miss every beautiful moment in your life!

The concise design makes it very easy to understand, and you can start recording with one click. Bright and dark modes are optional to protect your eyes.

Recording, playback, cutting, sharing with friends, these functions are all free. You can mark down important clips when recording, so that you can easily find it.

Super Recorder can convert the recorded voice into text, support more than 125 languages, hope it will be a good helper for your work and study.

Function Description:

High-quality recording:
· Freely select the sampling rate from 8000-48000Hz, and the bit rate from 64-320kbps
· Freely select to record mono or stereo audio
· Switch the bottom microphone and the top microphone
· Save the recording in MP3, AAC, WAV, M4A, AMR and other formats
· Real-time voice changer, change the pitch, and create interesting works
· Turn on the microphone gain, you can record clearer sound
· Add marks at important moments
· Add tags for your recordings, such as "meetings", "family", etc., you can quickly filter out all similar files

Edit function:
· You can cut the recording to remove parts
· Adjust the volume, zoom in or zoom out the volume
· Voice changer, we provide you with some voice change templates, such as male voice, female voice, loli, old man, etc. You can also adjust the parameters by yourself
· Skip mute when playing, save your time
· Variable speed during playback, you can choose 0.5-3 times

Transcription function:
· Real-time transcription: converting into text while recording, you can export and share the text
· File transcription: import audio files and convert them into text
· More than 125 languages
· You can export text to any social platform

Share the recording to friends:
You can share recordings to Line, Mail, WhatsApp, Messenger, WeChat, etc.

Other smart settings:
· Automatically pause recording when incoming call
· Automatically pause recording on low battery
· If the recording is turned off abnormally (the phone is turned off or for other reasons), the recording will be restored for you next time turn it on

Permission description:
Super Recorder needs access to microphone and storage permissions, which is necessary. You can choose whether to allow access to the following permissions:
· Pictures: When you report an error to us in "Feedback", you can submit a screenshot so that we can quickly locate the error.
· File storage: You can upload files to Super Reorder, edit or transcribe the files.

Upcoming features:
1. Encrypt your recording, you need to enter a password to play it, to ensure your privacy and file security.
2. Record the internal sound, there will be no noise in your recording.

Note: Super Recorder currently does not support call recording, we will add this feature later.

If you have any feedback, bug reports, suggestions or you can help with the translations, please contact us at superrecorder@outlook.com. Wish you a nice day!

creator: Video Screen Recorder, Voice Audio Editor, Cut MP3
descriptionHtml:
Super Recorder is a FREE and powerful voice recorder & audio transcription app, high-quality real-time recording, also you can mark the recording time point + edit audios + live transcribe!

Super Recorder, very easy to use, one-click to quickly transcribe voice to text and record various recording voice, such as study notes, meetings, lectures, music, save your voice memos, download NOW!

Free, Easy, Fast!
Great sound quality!
NO recording time limit!
Unlimited audio files sharing and export!
Don't miss me, download NOW!

Powerful recording function:

★ HiFi sound quality: record voice memos with high sound quality, Up to 128Khz sampling rate recording sound quality, clear voice capture!
★ Live transcription: transcribing audio to text, sound to text, dictation!
★ Add time marks: mark the important time points during recording, easy to view afterwards!
★ Real-time voice changer: Various voice effects are available, change your recording voice in real time!
★ Internal voice recording: Recording internal sound of your phone (Android 10+), super powerful!
★ Noise reduction for recording: Reduce audio noise in your recording, easy to hear your voice!
★ NO recording time limit: the recording times and duration are unlimited!
★ Unlimited audio files sharing: the audio files can be shared to any apps for free, without limit!
★ Easy to use: the voice recorder is clean and user friendly! All you need to do is just one tap!
★ Recording formats: support various recording formats of mp3, wav, aac, m4a, amr to choose from!
★ Video to Audio: Convert local video files to audio, extract music from video quickly!
★ Lock voice recording files: Easily lock your audio files, protect your privacy!
★ Playing skip silence: The mute part is automatically skipped when the recording is played, saving you time!
★ Audio editing: cut audios easily, more sound editor functions are waiting for you to explore!
★ Volume controller: boost sound volume freely, increase audio recording volume!
★ Audio parameters: voice sampling rate and bit rate are available, adjust the sound quality by yourself!
★ Microphone chooser: various microphones on the phone are optional, and the recording effect is better!
★ Sound channels: support mono / stereo recording selection, sound great!
★ Pause recording for incoming calls: when a call comes in, the recording stops automatically!
★ Stop recording when the battery is low: no longer worry about the failure of recording when your phone power off suddenly!

Free voice recorder, live transcript easily, easy to record sound, easy to use, download it NOW!

If you have any feedback, bug reports, suggestions or you can help with the translations, please contact us at superrecorder@outlook.com. Wish you a nice day!

Note: Super Recorder doesn’t support call recording for now.

descriptionHtml:
🥇🥇🥇Super Recorder - Portable recording assistant, voice memo, easily record and share recording files, help you convert recordings into text, high-quality lossless sound quality, your pocket recording expert.

【🎙️Professional Recorder】
Are you troubled by poor recording quality and noise? Tired of always interrupting and losing recordings? Come and try this recording expert!

＞ HI-FI High quality sound
＞ Support record internal sound
＞ Turn on Noise reduction mode
＞ Enhance human voice, even at a distance
＞ Mono & dual-channel recording
＞ Support Marking at important recording nodes
＞ Recording with Bluetooth headsets
＞ Scheduled recording
＞ Unlimited recording time
＞ Saving mobile phone storage space
＞ Minimal design, one-click recording
＞ Set the recording as ringtone
＞ Add tags to files and manage them by category
＞ Share with friends or upload to other platforms with one click

【▶️Unlimited playback recording】
Record lectures, interviews, meetings, personal notes, ideas, songs, etc. with one click, and play them back anytime, anywhere

- You can skip the silent part when playing
- Select a certain part of the recording and play it repeatedly
- Play at 0.5x-3x speed

【📝Recording transcription, speech to text】
The audio to text converter helps you record meeting notes and improve efficiency in school, work and life.

＞ Real-time transcription, speech to text while recording
＞ Upload files to transcribe
＞ Support more than 100 languages ​​for transcription
＞ Two transcription methods: online transcription and offline transcription
＞ Text can be exported and shared
＞ Unlimited offline speech to text time after subscription
＞ Add AI tools to automatically identify speakers
＞ Extract article summaries for you and summarize transcribed text
＞ Translate text into other languages, support more than 100 languages

【🛡️Ensure file security】
Ensure your files are confidential and secure, this is what we value most, you can trust this recorder safely.

- Recording files are only saved locally
- Support local transcription, no need to connect to the Internet, no need to upload to the server
- If you choose online transcription, we will also encrypt it and delete it immediately after the transcription is completed.
- No one can know what you are recording except yourself
- Lock the recording file and need a password to open the file

【✂️Powerful Audio Editor】
＞ Cut the recording, trim the recording length
＞ Adjust the volume of the audio
＞ Interesting voice changer
＞ Audio noise reduction
＞ Convert video to audio
